# ns_npa_policy_group (Resource)

NPAPolicyGroup Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ns_npa_policy_group" "my_npapolicygroup" {
  group_name = "...my_group_name..."
  group_order = {
    group_order = {
      group_id = "1"
      order    = "after"
    }
  }
  modify_by   = "...my_modify_by..."
  modify_type = "...my_modify_type..."
}
```
